Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke (7/18/18)
tool = script.Parent handle = tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local fairyScript = script:WaitForChild('FairyScript') local bitParticleEmitter = script:WaitForChild('BitParticleEmitter') local healingParticleEmitter = script:WaitForChild('BitHealingParticleEmitter')
local BASE_URL = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" local TEXTUREID = "2098377090" local SCALE = 5--2.5 local MESH_SCALE = .75
local created = false
local partTemplate = Instance.new('Part') partTemplate.CanCollide = false partTemplate.TopSurface = 'Smooth' partTemplate.BottomSurface = 'Smooth'
tool.Equipped:connect(function() local character = tool.Parent if not created and character and character.Parent == workspace then local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') local hrp = character:FindFirstChild('HumanoidRootPart') if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and hrp then created = true handle.Transparency = 1
local fairy = partTemplate:clone() fairy.Name = character.Name.."'s".."Fairy" fairy.Size = Vector3.new(.6,1,.6) * SCALE fairy.CFrame = hrp.CFrame
bitParticleEmitter:clone().Parent = fairy healingParticleEmitter:clone().Parent = fairy
local fairyMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') fairyMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh fairyMesh.MeshId = BASE_URL..'2098375558' fairyMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * SCALE/MESH_SCALE fairyMesh.TextureId = BASE_URL..TEXTUREID fairyMesh.Parent = fairy
------------------------------------------------- -------------------Left Wing--------------------- local leftWing = partTemplate:clone() leftWing.Name = 'LeftWing' leftWing.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.2) * SCALE
local wingMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') wingMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh wingMesh.MeshId = BASE_URL..'2098376327' wingMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * SCALE/MESH_SCALE wingMesh.TextureId = BASE_URL..TEXTUREID wingMesh.Parent = leftWing
local jointLW = Instance.new('Motor') jointLW.Name = 'LeftWingJoint' jointLW.Part0 = fairy jointLW.Part1 = leftWing jointLW.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-.15,0,0)*SCALE) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi*.5,0,0) jointLW.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(.15,-.07,-.25)*SCALE) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi*.5,0,0) jointLW.MaxVelocity = .1 jointLW.Parent = leftWing
leftWing.Parent = fairy -------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------- -------------------Right Wing-------------------- local rightWing = partTemplate:clone() rightWing.Name = 'RightWing' rightWing.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.5,.2) * SCALE
local wingMesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') wingMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh wingMesh.MeshId = BASE_URL..'2098376725' wingMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * SCALE/MESH_SCALE wingMesh.TextureId = BASE_URL..TEXTUREID wingMesh.Parent = rightWing
local jointRW = Instance.new('Motor') jointRW.Name = 'RightWingJoint' jointRW.Part0 = fairy jointRW.Part1 = rightWing jointRW.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(.15,0,0)*SCALE) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi*.5,0,0) jointRW.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-.15,-.07,-.25)*SCALE) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi*.5,0,0) jointRW.MaxVelocity = .1 jointRW.Parent = rightWing
rightWing.Parent = fairy -------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------- ---------------------Navi 1---------------------- local navi1 = partTemplate:clone() navi1.Name = 'Navi1' navi1.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.4,.4) * SCALE
local navi1Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') navi1Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh navi1Mesh.MeshId = BASE_URL..'2098375051' navi1Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * SCALE/MESH_SCALE navi1Mesh.TextureId = BASE_URL..TEXTUREID navi1Mesh.Parent = navi1
local jointN1 = Instance.new('Motor') jointN1.Name = 'NaviJoint' jointN1.Part0 = fairy jointN1.Part1 = navi1 jointN1.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(.5, .5, .5)*SCALE) jointN1.C1 = CFrame.new(0,0,0) jointN1.MaxVelocity = .01 jointN1.Parent = navi1
navi1.Parent = fairy -------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------- ---------------------Navi 2---------------------- local navi2 = partTemplate:clone() navi2.Name = 'Navi2' navi2.Size = Vector3.new(.5,.4,.4) * SCALE
local navi2Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') navi2Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh navi2Mesh.MeshId = BASE_URL..'2098375051' navi2Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * SCALE/MESH_SCALE navi2Mesh.TextureId = BASE_URL..TEXTUREID navi2Mesh.Parent = navi2
local jointN2 = Instance.new('Motor') jointN2.Name = 'NaviJoint' jointN2.Part0 = fairy jointN2.Part1 = navi2 jointN2.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(-.25, .75, .25)*SCALE) jointN2.C1 = CFrame.new(0,0,0) jointN2.MaxVelocity = .01 jointN2.Parent = navi2
navi2.Parent = fairy -------------------------------------------------
local bp = Instance.new('BodyPosition') bp.Name = 'BodyPosition' bp.MaxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*20000 bp.Position = hrp.Position + Vector3.new(0,3 + SCALE,0) bp.Parent = fairy
local bg = Instance.new('BodyGyro') bg.Name = 'BodyGyro' bg.MaxTorque = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * 400000 bg.CFrame = hrp.CFrame bg.Parent = fairy
local objectTag = Instance.new('ObjectValue') objectTag.Name = 'TargetTag' objectTag.Value = character objectTag.Parent = fairy
local newFairyScript = fairyScript:clone() newFairyScript.Parent = fairy newFairyScript.Disabled = false
fairy.Parent = workspace
tool:Destroy() end end end)

--Stickmasterluke
local fairy = script.Parent local targetTag = fairy:WaitForChild('TargetTag', 1) local bodyPosition = fairy:WaitForChild('BodyPosition', 1) local bodyGyro = fairy:WaitForChild('BodyGyro', 1) local healingParticleEmitter = fairy:WaitForChild('BitHealingParticleEmitter') local leftWing = fairy:WaitForChild('LeftWing', 1) local leftWingJoint = leftWing:WaitForChild('LeftWingJoint', 1) local rightWing = fairy:WaitForChild('RightWing', 1) local rightWingJoint = rightWing:WaitForChild('RightWingJoint', 1) local navi1 = fairy:WaitForChild('Navi1', 1) local navi1Joint = navi1:WaitForChild('NaviJoint', 1) local navi2 = fairy:WaitForChild('Navi2', 1) local navi2Joint = navi2:WaitForChild('NaviJoint', 1) local characterHealingParticles = nil
local HEALING_RATE = 2 local flapRate = 3 --1/2 local waveRange = math.pi*.25
local flapCount = 0
spawn(function() local startTime = tick() while true do if fairy and fairy.Parent and navi1 and navi1.Parent and navi1Joint and navi1Joint.Parent and navi2 and navi2.Parent and navi2Joint and navi2Joint.Parent then local wiggle1 = math.sin((tick()-startTime)*math.pi*2*.8) local wiggle2 = math.sin((tick()-startTime)*math.pi*2*.8*.618) navi1Joint.DesiredAngle = wiggle1 * math.pi*.1 navi2Joint.DesiredAngle = wiggle2 * math.pi*.1 else break end wait(.1) end end)
while true do if fairy and fairy.Parent and leftWingJoint and leftWingJoint.Parent and rightWingJoint and rightWingJoint.Parent then flapCount = flapCount + 1 local wave = (flapCount%2) *2 - 1 leftWingJoint.DesiredAngle = wave * waveRange rightWingJoint.DesiredAngle = -wave * waveRange else break end
if targetTag and targetTag.Parent and targetTag.Value and targetTag.Value.Parent and bodyPosition and bodyGyro then local hrp = targetTag.Value:FindFirstChild('HumanoidRootPart') local humanoid = targetTag.Value:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') if hrp and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then bodyPosition.position = (hrp.CFrame * CFrame.new(3, 4, 2)).p bodyGyro.CFrame = hrp.CFrame local healing = humanoid.Health < humanoid.MaxHealth healingParticleEmitter.Enabled = healing if healing then humanoid.Health = math.min(humanoid.Health+(.5/flapRate)*HEALING_RATE, humanoid.MaxHealth) end if lastHealing ~= healing then if healing then -- Starting Healing if not (characterHealingParticles and characterHealingParticles.Parent) then characterHealingParticles = healingParticleEmitter:clone() characterHealingParticles.Parent = hrp end characterHealingParticles.Enabled = true else -- Ending Healing if characterHealingParticles and characterHealingParticles.Parent then characterHealingParticles.Enabled = false end end end lastHealing = healing else break end else break end
wait(.5/flapRate) end
if characterHealingParticles and characterHealingParticles.Parent then characterHealingParticles:Destroy() end
if fairy and fairy.Parent then fairy:Destroy() end

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
